name: RING
description: $RING Unifies gaming, DeFi, NFTs, and e-commerce into one interoperable token economy. Most Web3 tokens fade quickly â€” built for hype, bound to a single platform, and forgotten when the trend dies. $RING takes a different path. It is deployed across both BEP and ERC chains, serving as the backbone of RingChain: a decentralized entertainment and financial protocol designed for long-term growth and utility. From GameFi rewards to bookmaker payouts, e-commerce transactions to NFT bonuses, $RING connects the fragmented pieces of the digital economy into one interoperable token.
